page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT AROUND WINCHESTER
page.content: Many people live on the outskirts of Winchester and travel into the city centre to their{jobs.}There are many large buildings around Winchester where people can{work,}for example in the hospital doctors, nurses, cooks, cleaners,receptionists etc.are needed. Another large building is the prison. This needs many prison officers to guard the prisoners. There are many schools where qualified teachers can work. Also schools need cleaners, caretakers and secretaries to work on the premises.Some of the people in Winchester are employed by the City and County councils, most of them working as architects, computer operators, engineers, secretaries etc. {Employment}in the area is good because of the variety and number of large employers who need many people to work for them.
